name: wr.umbracophonemanager.personalisation
description: Phone Manager Personalisation Groups plugin is an Umbraco package to add a Phone Manager criteria item to the Personalisation Groups package. Using this it is possible to personalise your site based on the selected Phone Manager campaign.
readme: This package requires both Phone Manager and Personalisation Groups packages to be installed before installing. For setup instructions and to inspect the source code, visit: https://github.com/willroscoe/UmbracoPhoneManager
